description.value:
Armour Sections wrapped in chains, or that bind weapons to the armour. Provides +3 to any Willpower Test to Resist Fear or Cohesion Damage

Requirements

Deathwatch Initiate may start with one appropriate Chapter Trapping. Chapter: Black Templars

Effect: Initiated

Notes: -
